topic.title: Sneeking suspecions and Proposals
topic.body: Am I the only one with these sneeking suspecions, and the only one with this proposal.. I reckon ZeroNet Tor always mode Should BE ALWAYS. I mean always. Not sometimes, but tor should 100% of the time be always. ||| Point number 2. ||| I have a sneeking suspecion that every new version of Linux has a backdoor now. It seems to me the latest and greatest version of Linux backdoor free is >> Linux Mint 18.3 <<. What u guys think? Anyone agree? Let's hear yo thoughts............
